website_summaries.verdict: With its unique tiered design, this frilly crib skirt adds a girly touch that's not overly precious.
pros: Measures 52 inches long by 27 inches wide
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Only covers three sides, but this can easily be hidden against a wall

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We are expecting a grandson, so I converted one of the guest rooms to a nursery when baby comes to Nana’s house. I wanted something I could add a splash of pink to if I have a granddaughter in the future, so this works perfectly. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia T.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful classic crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase. I love the beautiful blush color which is not too pink, but adds just enough color to the room to be noticed. I love the tiny ruffles and the way the skirt hangs. I can tell this material is really easily snagged and we have a cat which made me a little nervous, but so far, no snags and a very happy cat who loves hiding under the crib like its her own personal palace.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle  H.

customer_reviews.title: Only covers 3 sides!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this dust ruffle for the price.... it only covers 3 sides! It works if you are putting the long edge of the crib against a wall (as we are doing now), but I would have preferred an all around ruffle to give me some flexibility with the room layout:( Also... It is a very snag-friendly material. I do not have high hopes for it holding up well with time - but I will update later as I have only had it a few days. On the whole, I've had better crib ruffles for less.
customer_reviews.author: WhidbeyMom

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm so cheap but let myself spend extra money on this for my baby girl's nursery! It is so almost perfect! So beautiful! My only part I'm disappointed with is that I wish it would have a fourth back side. It wouldn't have to have the pretty material on the back, but something in the back would make it stay on more balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: For a Feminine, Dreamy Nursery
customer_reviews.text: I looked extensively for the perfect crib skirt for my little girl's teal,yellow, and hot pink nursery. I couldn't be happier with this one! It's crepey thin in material and looks exactly like it does in the picture. The best part is that it doesn't show dust or hair whatsoever. It looks so pretty on my newborn's crib, but I imagine it'll look even sweeter sweeping the floor when I lower the crib height in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, good quality, worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bed skirt about a year ago, and I fell in love with it right away! I love that there is so much length too it, and makes the bed look so cozy. The material is lightweight and not transparent by any means. Very happy with my purchase, although I wish this company would make it four sided so we could enjoy it on a toddler bed as well. Never had any issues with tearing or snagging, the material has a bit of stretch to it. I would definitely recommend this item to anyone wanting a good quality material, and special look to their little ones crib. It was worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne C

customer_reviews.title: Great Material and great look!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue. Not knowing if we were having a boy or girl yet, it was perfect because the ruffles make it girly if needed, and the blue would make it great for a boy still. We just found out it is a boy!!! I think this is perfect for a boy too! I really like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shade!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute perfect shade of blush pink! I am so happy with this. It looks pricey but it wasn’t! My little ones nursery is complete
customer_reviews.author: F. C.

customer_reviews.title: Look nice with a white crib
customer_reviews.text: Look nice with a white crib, dark salmon color, however prepare that u won’t be able to wash it,unless maybe a lite hand wash ( and I mean not as washer cycle but just really by your hands) as a material is really delicate and it will fall a part. Other then that it’s ok
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, feminine.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful true blush (soft slightly peachy-pink) and sweet, elegant texture. True to photos. Only 3 sides of skirting so would not work well for cribs placed with the short side against the wall. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ELD

customer_reviews.title: Great crib skirt for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely adorable crib skirt for the price. On a normal crib, at the highest (infant) setting the skirt will come almost to the floor (less than an inch!) Once I lower the crib, the skirt will be on the floor. I found this while shopping in Babies R' Us and it was much cheaper. I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: 1sttimeMomWendi

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baby girl’s room! Love the design- it looks delicate, but seems durable enough. No unraveling or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amers00

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous... but...
customer_reviews.text: Love this skirt... I do have one complaint. The part that goes between mattress that holds the skirt in place is not navy, but white. So you have to pull the skirt up to hide the white, so then the skirt doesn't touch the floor. Not too big a deal. The ruffles and color are perfect for my new ones nursery!
customer_reviews.author: facey21

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but more yellow than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely beautiful, just a little too yellow for our off-white crib. I really wish it would have worked out though because it seemed well made and was super cute
customer_reviews.author: Tashauna

customer_reviews.title: this looks so pretty in my daughter's room
customer_reviews.text: Colors are true. this looks so pretty in my daughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: maddi

customer_reviews.title: Great color and style
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten so many compliments on this skirt. We have a gold crib and it compliments it perfectly. Soft and delicate. Can slide down easily but once you have it in place the mattress keeps it right where it belongs
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as pictured am very happy with it. Makes the bedding and crib look 10x better.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Loved the color, not for kids rooms...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect coral color for what I was going for. Fabric catches on a lot of stuff, so it’s a little to fragile for a kids room.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Cute but slightly flawed
customer_reviews.text: The connecting material that goes under the mattress is thin and very stretchy. I will have to find a way to anchor it down otherwise it sags and the white part shows. Still cute though.
customer_reviews.author: JessMRD

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down The Most Beautiful BedSkirt I Ever Saw
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material and craftsmanship of the sewing make this bed skirt worth more than double the price. Beautiful and soft like the grand daughter I purchased it for . Gossamer !
customer_reviews.author: Cindy binning

customer_reviews.title: Super cute ruffled skirt!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute on our crib and just what I was looking for. The ruffles could be used for a boy or girls bed since it's a darker blue color. Nice light weight material. Only covers 3 sides but we have our crib against the wall so that wasn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Benson

customer_reviews.title: So pretty, soft, and delicate!
customer_reviews.text: Got this crib skirt SO fast!! It’s much nicer material than I expected and so delicate and pretty. We are having a girl in September and I really wanted a delicate and dreamy look for the nursery and crib and this worked out perfectly for that. I highly recommend trying this brand out! Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn A Crane

customer_reviews.title: Pretty coral color
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and super girly. My only complaint is it slides off of the crib pretty easily when changing the sheet. It completed the look of our nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Baleigh W

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: A deeper pink than pictured, but that worked in my benefit. Very cute ruffle skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed skirt. Color was slightly warmer than pictured but it works perfectly in the room. I washed it with the sheets & had no issues with fabric breakdown.
customer_reviews.author: Nessie

customer_reviews.title: Goes Perfectly with my yellow and gray nursery!
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt went perfectly with my yellow and gray nursery for my soon to be newborn girl.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Subtle and girly
customer_reviews.text: This is gorgeous! Well worth the price. Subtle and girly, perfect for our nursery!
customer_reviews.author: SABOUG

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt is very well made. The price is considerably reasonable and it fits a standard crib just beautifully. It have my daughter's crib that extra pop of color it needed. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gwills

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt is so pretty and girly! It is great quality and goes perfect with our bedding! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SuzieP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect length and looks exactly how I was hoping. I see reviews about fraying and ours did not come frayed. Haven’t washed yet but will do in lingerie bag on gentle cycle. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W Mellon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It matches the sheets I purchased perfect. I've got a lot of comments on it already.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy DiBernardo

customer_reviews.title: I still like it however
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a chiffon finish, but this was a strechy jersey cotton material. I still like it however, the yellow matches perfectly with the crib sheet we picked out.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not the color I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Never used it because the color came out hot pink rather than coral like advertised. I will be selling it at a resale shop for children I guess. I never had time to return as I had a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in both the pictures and in person and fits perfectly. I love the ruffles!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Linn

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib skirt for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib skirt for the price! Purchased light corral and color was same as pictured. Skirt is a thin material so worried about how long it will hold up but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Teal Crib Skirt
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, just what I need to finish my nursery. Thank you. Well made, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlaine Kresge

customer_reviews.title: Slight color difference
customer_reviews.text: It's a lighter color in person than in the picture. It seems brighter and more vibrant in the photo and it's actually a more pale, soft color. It's still cute and we'll make it work but it's a little different colorwise than we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ardery

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful look but lighter than picture shows. Unfortunately had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE!! Super great price
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE!! Super great price, great quality and fits my crib perfect. I'm so happy I bought this one after looking at hundreds. Even for a boy I think it looks chic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this dust ruffle
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this dust ruffle. It's adorable and pairs nicely with so many bed sheets BUT I've had mine since April and it's now August and it's frayed and coming apart horribly all over the front. ☹️ It's been hand washed ONCE and then dried on a line. I wouldn't buy it again although it's very cute. Definitely more for looks than regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Maxi

customer_reviews.title: Looked great at the lowest setting
customer_reviews.text: Looks more full and gathered online than it actually is. Looked great at the lowest setting. But when at the infant (highest) setting it hug really uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Reed

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt love it more.
customer_reviews.text: This cribs skirt is the cutest. It is soft, the color is Suttle but vibrant. It gave our not so girly nursery the girly ness touch it really needed. It fit our standard crib perfect. It also looks like it will not tear easy, very durable!
customer_reviews.author: VJSOUP

customer_reviews.title: Great crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt works perfectly for our daughter's Beauty and the Beast themed nursery!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Adds texture to the room
customer_reviews.text: The skirt matches my bedroom design, but it's NOT as it's pictured. It's longer than most bed skirts but does not touch the ground. I wouldn't by it again.
customer_reviews.author: Shante

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this crib skirt. It's long and stretchy. The color is a little darker than the picture shows, its almost more of a teal, but its gorgeous and turned out to be perfect for my little girl's room.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Lemonade Blog

customer_reviews.title: Loved the color
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color. It's just a pain to keep it in place. It has no back side to even out the weight on all four sided.
customer_reviews.author: April Sikora

customer_reviews.title: Used in a portable crib
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and exactly what I was looking for. I thought it was going to be a tad bit longer but it's ok because the height on my crib is adjustable so once my daughter gets older im going to lower it some anyway. The color and design is great and nice and heavy
customer_reviews.author: nicole s.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful! The photo does no justice with how soft and flowy it is.
customer_reviews.author: KtMcG

customer_reviews.title: It's very beautiful. Took our nursery to the next level
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality. It's very beautiful. Took our nursery to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute as a Button
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable with the cute ruffles for our first Grandchild's crib! Thanks for the fast shipping! Will definitely order again & recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Hall

customer_reviews.title: but it's really pretty.
customer_reviews.text: It is only three-sided and is hard to position under the mattress. I wish it had a third side or ties to keep it in place, but it's really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B. King

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted and with great quality. I would recommend the seller and the product! Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Careful if you wash it, I should have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Careful if you wash it, I should have been more careful, the hem pulled a bit. Also, it's only 3 sides!
customer_reviews.author: BMore JC

customer_reviews.title: ... little darker than the picture shows but it is beautiful and goes on super easy
customer_reviews.text: It's a little darker than the picture shows but it is beautiful and goes on super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Steelergrrl43

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, fabric is high quality. So cute completed the nursery!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Bilte

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bed skirt. I only wish it came in more colors. The material is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This crib bed ruffle was perfect for my future Granddaughters room and the coral color ...
customer_reviews.text: This crib bed ruffle was perfect for my future Granddaughters room and the coral color was definitely coral not pink.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Colvin

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful color and exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful color and exactly what I was looking for, but it's extremely thin material and with it only being 3 sided, the white portion hangs down beyond the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Love it. And matching valance curtains are great for pulling together a nursery!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color was not teal as in description. Definitely much more green.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! The exact color I needed and fit so perfectly on my crib.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured, perfect in our nursery!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, soft, laundered well. Perfect compliment to our nursery decor.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpackwildcats

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exatly like what they show in the photo. Fits my standard size crib and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! The hot pink it perfect! Fabric is soft!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Cole

customer_reviews.title: Nice girly bed skirt with ruffles
customer_reviews.text: Nice girly bed skirt with ruffles. Gave it 4 stars since it covers only 3 sides, which was not mentioned in product description. The product is overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: This crib skirt looked exactly as expected when it arrived and is perfect. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Russo

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. Great hot pink color. Looks really cute on my white crib. Overall very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jg

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: The crib skirt is perfect! I love that it was ready to be applied to the mattress as any wrinkles are disguised in the ruffles. I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Feliz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it just what i was looking for and matched perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jlynn

product_meta.title: Pink Tiered Ruffled Crib Skirt Baby Girl Nursery Bedding Dust Ruffle avisiontoremember
feature_bullets: ♥WRINKLE FREE!: Beautiful and soft fabric that has a luxury appearance and is wrinkle free right out of the packaging! Life just became easier
♥Ruffles on 3 sides of the Crib: ruffle crib skirt is easy to install with ruffles on 3 sides (1 long side and 2 short sides)
♥HIGHEST QUALITY FABRIC: polyester/spandex mix fabric. The bed skirt is soo soft!
♥SIMPLE CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Wash cold light cycle and air dry. The perfect addition to your baby’s custom crib bedding set.

♥PERFECT FIT & EXTRA LONG: the longest crib skirt on the market measuring in at a whopping 16" tall. Fits a standard crib/toddler bed at 27" x 52". Includes split corners to easily install the dust ruffle. Washing and changing is a breeze!

specifications.Best uses: Baby nursery crib bedding decoration decor girl boy gender neutral
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars160 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
